sentences.sContent: Instead, he appears determined to cling to power.
sentences.sCn: 反而，他看来坚决要握紧权力不放。

sentences.sContent: Another congressman clung on with a majority of only 18.
sentences.sCn: 另一位国会议员在获得仅仅18张多数票的情况下保住了位子。

trans.tranOther: If someone clings to a position or a possession they have, they do everything they can to keep it even though this may be very difficult
